summary:
An AIR application that will make it easier to find vendors, houses and crafting equipment in the skyrim world. For the explorers; now you can add locations you discovered to your map!
WIP
descriptionHtml:
******************************
**  Interactive Skyrim Map  **
**           v0.3           **
******************************


===============
Description:
===============

This is a standalone interactive map of skyrim. 

During my travels in the skyrim realm, you sometimes need a sertain vendor, trainer, 
or maybe you want plan a trading route. This project is about making the finding of 
locations for your every need as easy as possible.

the next on my to-do list will be bug fixing, optimisation & export & combine for locations


------------------
-Features (v0.3)-
------------------

- click on locations to see their name and data (most data not present yet)
- edit location data (saved on exit)
- filter locations
- highlight on functionality
- zoom, pan
- search for locations
- added exploration
	- use the add button in search to add to your explored locations
	- turn on/off in help menu

--------------
-requirements-
--------------

- Adobe AIR (http://get.adobe.com/air/)

----------
-versions-
----------

v0.3

- show selected location (green)
- location editing (saves on exit application)
- added search
- added exploration
- changed alot in code & system


[For older versions see file details]

--------------
-To be Added:-
--------------

Must:
-Make map look better
-User friendly Interface
-export & import location details

Should:
-Filter on hold/region
-Search Location
  - zoom to location
-add option menu (add customisation to exploration, profiles/paths, change background?)

Could:
-add custom property functionality to locations (you can add anything you want)
-add pathfinding and/or planner

Would:
-zoom in on the larger locations (maybe minimap images)
-add mobile support (if possible & realistic)

---------------
-Known issues:-
---------------

- hovering over locations makes them go wild (some mouse detection thing)
- names (some names are displayed as instance x x)

===============
Install:
===============

1.) get Adobe AIR from: http://get.adobe.com/air/

2.) Extract.
3.) Install using installer
4.) Start application


===============
Credits:
===============

gamebanshee for the map I based my version on
http://www.gamebanshee.com/skyrim/mapofskyrim.php

GreenSock for the Tween Library
http://www.greensock.com/tweenlite/

Elyon for the icons
author: hexagon06

files.name: SkyrimMap AIR installer
files.changelogHtml:
panning
zooming
hover (hold capitals, settlements)
location placeholder
placeholders

files.name: SkyrimMap AIR installer v015
files.changelogHtml:
added icons for all locations
each location is named and has a \"Location Type\"
Location Type filter works

files.name: SkyrimMap AIR installer v02
files.changelogHtml:
changed background
shows borders & roads
fixed resize (you shouldn\'t see any white around the map after resizing the window)
zooming is now based on where your mouse is pointing
panning is now done by clicking & dragging the map (no space bar)

files.name: SkyrimMap AIR installer v025
files.changelogHtml:
All filters work (most locations don\'t have any data though)
highlight works (same issue with missing data)
houses are now only present in the correct locations
spell vendors added
added some locations for each functionality

files.name: SkyrimMap AIR installer v03
files.changelogHtml:
show selected location (green)
location editing (saves on exit application)
added search
added exploration
changed alot in code & system
